refnamediv.refpurpose: retrieve the SSL cipher associated with a session

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get0_cipher() retrieves the cipher that was used by the connection when the session was created, or NULL if it cannot be determined.
The value returned is a pointer to an object maintained within s and should not be released.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get0_cipher() was first added to OpenSSL 1.1.0
